text.text_translated:
Suzanne Collins is an American writer. She wrote a very popular book. Its name is "The Hunger Games". This is a game where young people fight to live. This book is for teenagers and young people.

It came out in 2008. Many people bought it. It sold millions of copies. You can read it in 26 languages. It was the first book for young people to sell over a million copies on computers. This shows it is very successful.

Now, "The Hunger Games" is also a big film from Hollywood. The film is also very successful. It is as successful as the book. It made 152.5 million dollars in its first weekend. This was only in North America.

best_attempt.text_translated: The Hunger Games is a very famous book. It is for teenagers and young people. Suzanne Collins is an American writer. She wrote this book. It came out in 2008. It is in 26 languages. It sold millions of copies. It is the first book for young people. It sold over a million copies on computers. Now, The Hunger Games is also a big film from Hollywood. The film is also very famous. It made 152.5 million dollars in its first weekend. This was only in North America.
